participant_1.name: Mark Johnson
participant_1.personality: Mark is reflective and enjoys sharing his life experiences. He has a nurturing side, stemming from his years as a gym teacher, and values honesty and hard work.
participant_1.background: cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i'm a retired gym teacher. i like watching war documentaries. i was poor growing up.

participant_2.name: Sarah Thompson
participant_2.personality: Sarah is energetic and jovial, always looking for ways to engage with others. She has a strong sense of family and enjoys both relaxation and fun activities.
participant_2.background: i coach little league baseball. i also like a glass of wine in the evenings. i drive a mini van. i have five sons. coffee is my preferred beverage.
